Goal: improve energy efficiency, indexed to net sales, by 30% by 2025 Goal: increase renewable energy to 50% of total electricity use by 2025 In 2019, we achieved our 2025 goal by surpassing 25% renewable electricity.

As part of our strategic focus on empowering Science for Climate, we increased our interim target from 25% to 50% renewable electricity by 2025, toward our ultimate goal of 100% renewable electricity by 2050.
3M has reduced Scope 1 GHG emissions by 82.3% since 2002, providing a direct and immediate reduction of our carbon emissions.
During this same timeframe, we achieved a 75.0% reduction in absolute Scope 1 and 2 location-based GHG emissions.

GHG emission reductions are achieved through a variety of methods: improving process and equipment efficiency, upgrading equipment, reducing our demand for energy use, increasing our use of renewable electricity, and implementing and maintaining emission control technologies.
